snippet: Professor Bennett played a vital role in deciphering Linear B, the Bronze Age Aegean script that defied solution for more than 50 years.
abstract: Emmett L Bennett Jr, classicist who played a vital role in deciphering Bronze Age script known as Linear B, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Professor Bennett played a vital role in deciphering Linear B, the Bronze Age Aegean script that defied solution for more than 50 years.

headline.seo: Emmett L. Bennett Jr. Dies at 93; Helped Decipher Linear B
headline.main: Emmett L. Bennett Jr., Expert on Ancient Script, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Emmett L. Bennett Jr., Ancient Script Expert, Dies at 93
